thread.title: GFA for Ordinary Congress on November 9
thread.title_full: GFA for Ordinary Congress on November 9

title: GFA for Ordinary Congress on November 9
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 17:00 CET GFA for Ordinary Congress on November 9 By GNA 
Accra, Oct. 20, GNA - The Ghana Football Association (GFA), will hold on November 9-10, organised its Ordinary Congress at the Ghanaman Soccer Centre of Excellence in Prampram. 
In all 123 delegates are to expected to convene at the venue to review the activity report for the just ended football season and usher in the new season. 
The ordinary congress according to the GFA, is in accordance with Article 23.3.1 of the GFA Statutes which states that "The GFA Congress shall meet in ordinary session once every football season normally before the commencement of the season". 
GNA Sports News Follow Us never fall in love because if you do, you may find it difficult to rise; rather stand in love. By: oluwafemi daniel dos
